column1: 这里是在挑寿司吧哈哈哈
Fleeting vestiges of tranquility 不过昙花一现的安宁
futile delusions 不过虚无缥缈的泡影
in the eyes of gods eternal 但在她眼中亦如永恒
But even archons rest their watchful eyes 神明也会稍敛威光
after centuries without sleep 暂息百年统御
In these moments of stillness 彼时 她们同宁静起舞
amidst eons of sorrow 与灾祸周旋
And in these moments of quiet 那来之不易的和平
in the calm of viridescent fields 如绿野旷然
Laid to rest by the tranquil lull 谁不想醉心于此
of blissful mundanity 一齐杯酒言欢
When the woes of the world seem as no more than a passing dream 而世间苦痛 不过须臾之梦
Beneath the gentle sway 物是人非 时过境迁
of a thousand Sakura blossoms 樱花依旧纷繁鲜艳
Can barely be heard above cheering and laughter. 终隐入欢歌笑语
Is it so wrong? 何过之有
For a god to dream 神之所愿
To so dearly wish for 其之爱执
something so small 不过一方净土
To wish this moment would last 更盼此刻须臾
Just a little longer 稍作停歇
